text: Boris Furmanov (; 17 December 1936 â€“ 8 February 2022) was a Russian politician. He was Minister of Architecture, Construction, and Housing from 1991 to 1992. Furmanov died on 8 February 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Luhansk Oblast
